article.title: Avidy훮
article.text:
'''Avidy훮''' may refer to:
* [[Avidy훮 (Buddhism)]], a Buddhist concept which denotes ignorance of the four noble truths or misunderstanding of the nature of reality.
* [[Avidya (Hinduism)]], a Sanskrit word for ignorance or delusion in the finite self which appears in Hindu texts such as the Upanishads.

{{Disambiguation}}
